def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") from Benner.ERP.Comum import Utils
widget.View.Commands["DELETE"].Visible = Utils.VerificaPermissao("EXCLUIRFORNECEDOR", "MODULO_CONTRATOS", "EXCLUIR_CLIENTES", "MODULO_COMERCIAL", "MODULO_FINANCEIRO", "MODULO_TRIBUTOS") widget.View.Commands["EDIT"].Visible = Utils.VerificaPermissao("MANTERFORNECEDOR", "MODULO_CONTRATOS", "MANTER_CLIENTES", "MODULO_COMERCIAL", "MODULO_FINANCEIRO", "MODULO_TRIBUTOS") widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = Utils.VerificaPermissao("MANTERFORNECEDOR", "MODULO_CONTRATOS", "MANTER_CLIENTES", "MODULO_COMERCIAL", "MODULO_FINANCEIRO", "MODULO_TRIBUTOS")
